paragraphs: Welcome to my portfolio! I'm passionate about creating amazing digital experiences and solving complex problems through code.
This portfolio showcases my journey, projects, and skills. Feel free to explore and get in touch if you'd like to collaborate!

items.name: Portfolio Website
description: A modern, responsive portfolio website built with vanilla JavaScript
Features dark/light mode, dynamic content loading, and GitHub integration
Fully configurable through JSON with automated README generation

responsibilities: Developed and maintained responsive, high-performance web applications using React.js, Next.js, and TypeScript.
Implemented dynamic UIs with Tailwind CSS and integrated component libraries like MUI and Radix UI for consistency and accessibility.
Worked on multilingual support and SEO optimization strategies using Next.js features like server-side rendering and dynamic routing.
Built reusable components and optimized state management using tools like Zustand and Redux Toolkit.
Integrated RESTful APIs and third-party services (e.g., trading platforms, CMS systems) into frontend architecture.
Collaborated with backend developers and designers to deliver pixel-perfect implementations from Figma/Adobe XD mockups.
Improved frontend performance through lazy loading, code-splitting, and Lighthouse audits, achieving up to 30% faster page load times.
Contributed to enterprise-level projects like 'Dubai & Beyond' and 'Noor Capital', focusing on complex data visualizations and user dashboard experiences.
Worked on multiple client-facing React.js and Django applications, focusing on modular and maintainable codebases.
Created responsive UI components using CSS, Bootstrap and integrated with backend services via RESTful APIs.
Collaborated in agile teams to deliver feature updates and bug fixes on a biweekly sprint cycle.
Integrated third-party services like authentication (NextAuth.js) and form validation libraries (React Hook Form).
Enhanced application performance by optimizing rendering logic and reducing bundle size.
Participated in peer code reviews and contributed to improving project architecture and best practices.
Maintained documentation for components and assisted junior developers in understanding project workflows.
Built and maintained 3 CRUD-based web applications using Angular for frontend and Django for backend, handling 1,000+ daily transactions.
Created 10+ RESTful APIs and integrated them with Angular components to reduce data load time by 50%.
Designed responsive layouts and forms with Bootstrap and HTML5, achieving 98% mobile compatibility.

categories.name: Certifications
items: You can also add certifications without links

footer.tagline: Let's connect and build something amazing together!
